content: Still Flexin, Still Steppin is the fifteenth mixtape by American rapper YoungBoy Never Broke Again. It was released on February 21, 2020, by Never Broke Again and Atlantic Records. It features a lone collaboration with the rapper Quando Rondo on the track "Suited Panamera". YoungBoy Never Broke Again also released a music video for the song "Lil Top".The mixtape debuted at number two on the US Billboard 200 with 91,000 album-equivalent units in its first week, becoming YoungBoy Never Broke Again's second-highest charting album after his 2019 number-one album AI YoungBoy 2. The mixtape was certified gold by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) in October 2020.
